articles.description: LPG Price Cut: Oil marketing companies have given a big relief by reducing the prices of LPG cylinders just before the results of the ongoing Lok Sabha elections in the country. The new rates have been implemented from Delhi to Chennai from the first of June.…

articles.author: Pratik Bhanushali
articles.title: Hero Splendor Plus Xtec 2.0 – Top five highlights - BikeWale
articles.description: Hero MotoCorp recently launched the updated Splendor Plus Xtec in India as the 2.0 version. The Splendor has been a household name in the commuter market and is well-known nationwide for being a trusty bike.
